Journal.Title: Scandinavian journal of work, environment & health

Article.ArticleTitle: Post-COVID condition or "long COVID", return-to work, and occupational health research.

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: University Angers, CHU Angers, Univ Rennes, Inserm, EHESP, Irset, UMR_S 1085, SFR ICAT, Angers, France. alexis.descatha@inserm.fr.

MedlineCitation.CoiStatement: Authors are paid form their institutions. AD is editor in chief of Archives des maladies professionnelles et de l’environnement and received form a regional grant (TEC-TOP, Pays de la Loire Region, Angers Loire Metropole, University of Angers, CHU Angers).
